price: 32. Estos respondieron: “¡Gloria a ti! Solo sabemos lo que Tú nos has enseñado. En verdad, Tú eres el Omnisciente, el Sabio”.
arabic: قَالُواْ سُبۡحَٰنَكَ لَا عِلۡمَ لَنَآ إِلَّا مَا عَلَّمۡتَنَآۖ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: qālū sub'ḥānaka lā ʿil'ma lanā illā mā ʿallamtanā innaka anta al-ʿalīmu al-ḥakīmu
